keyword: how many calories in tortilla chips
title: How Many Calories in Tortilla Chips?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in tortilla chips for a standard 28g serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in Tortilla Chips?
assumptions: Plain corn tortilla chips, fried, standard commercial variety, about 10-12 chips per 28g serving.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, frying method, flavorings, and serving size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 28g serving of tortilla chips contains about 140 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Flavored variety (e.g., with cheese seasoning) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of tortilla chips?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal in a 28g serving (roughly 10-12 chips).

faqs.q: Are tortilla chips high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 18g carbs per 28g serving, with 1.4g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in tortilla chips?
faqs.a: Approximately 7g total fat per 28g serving, including 1g saturated fat.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in tortilla chips?
faqs.a: About 168mg sodium per 28g serving; varies by brand and flavor.
